}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *Wireless 300Mbps 802.11abgn two chain, dual band WLAN :with Bluetooth 4.0 LE Combo and Wi-Fi Direct & Miracast
[[Atheros reference design]] WB222 (QCA codename Jupiter P/N AR5B22) :[[Atheros]] AR9462-BL3A chipset module :2R2T Mini PCIe Wi-Fi (halfcard) Adapter Card :DualBand 802.11abgn up to 300Mbps :BLE BT4.0 with combo MIMO Wi~Fi 2x2 :Extended Operating Grade Build with WoW Support :ISO controlled manufacturer with full Lifecycle Management
According to the [https://fccid.io/2AE3B-AEH-AR9462/] on the FCC, the following models are based on identical core design: * AEH-AR9462 * AEH-AR9462-LCB * AEH-AR9462-LXB
[[Category:English Documentation]]
